title: Enhancing Practical Teaching Competencies: Intelligent Modeling Based on General-Purpose Learning in the Mammalian Brain

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic neuroscience and machine learning theory, with advanced mathematical (differential equations, optimization) background
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: The mathematical structure of the 4th-generation ADP (Adaptive Dynamic Programming) model, which explains the learning mechanisms of the mammalian brain, can be analyzed.
A brain-based optimization system can be implemented in a simulation environment using an ADP framework that includes reinforcement learning.
A methodology for designing brain-inspired intelligence algorithms linked to NSF cognitive optimization research directions can be explained.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
